### Getting There {-}

```{r fig.align='left', echo=FALSE, include=identical(knitr:::pandoc_to(), 'html')}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/maps/homeless_camp_in_strawberry_los_santos.png', dpi = NA)
```
The homeless camp in Los Santos is under the [Olympic Freeway in Strawberry](https://grandtheftdata.com/landmarks/#252.086,-1208.975,5,hybrid,name,Strawberry_Subway_Station,_Downtown). 

```{r fig.align='left', echo=FALSE, include=identical(knitr:::pandoc_to(), 'html')}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/maps/dignity_village.png', dpi = NA)
```
Dignity Village is a tent city established by homeless people near Procopio Beach, east of [Paleto Bay](https://grandtheftdata.com/landmarks/#-171.667,6208.676,5,hybrid,name=paleto_bay,Belinda_May's_Beauty_Salon,_Paleto_Blvd,_Paleto_Bay).

## Tutorial {-}

### In-game Smartphone Camera {-}

Snapmatic is the photo app on your simulated mobile phone in GTA V.

+ Press ```UP``` on the on the keyboard (PC) or d-pad (Playstation) to bring up your phone.

+ Select the Snapmatic app - it's on the bottom left of the homescreen.

```{r fig.align='center', echo=FALSE, include=identical(knitr:::pandoc_to(), 'html')}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/scriptingGifs/snapmatic0.gif', dpi = NA)
```

+ Move the camera with the ```Mouse``` on PC, or with the ```RIGHT STICK``` on Playstation. 

```{r fig.align='center', echo=FALSE, include=identical(knitr:::pandoc_to(), 'html')}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/scriptingGifs/snapmatic1.gif', dpi = NA)
```

+ Zoom in and out with the ```Mouse Wheel``` on PC, or ```LEFT STICK``` on Playstation.

```{r fig.align='center', echo=FALSE, include=identical(knitr:::pandoc_to(), 'html')}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/scriptingGifs/snapmatic2.gif', dpi = NA)
```

+ You can shuffle through filters with ```DOWN``` or borders with ```UP```.

```{r fig.align='center', echo=FALSE, include=identical(knitr:::pandoc_to(), 'html')}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/scriptingGifs/snapmatic3.gif', dpi = NA)
```

+ To take selfie press the ```Mouse Wheel Button``` on PC or ```R3 STICK``` on Playstation to turn the camera on yourself.

```{r fig.align='center', echo=FALSE, include=identical(knitr:::pandoc_to(), 'html')}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/scriptingGifs/snapmatic4.gif', dpi = NA)
```

+ Once you're happy, take the photo with ``Ènter``` on pc or ```X``` on the Playstation. Press it again to save it to the Gallery.

```{r fig.align='center', echo=FALSE, include=identical(knitr:::pandoc_to(), 'html')}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/scriptingGifs/snapmatic5.gif', dpi = NA)
```

+ You can upload your picture to your Rockstar Game sSocial Club profile by going to the gallery and pressing the "Left Ctrl" key on PC.

```{r fig.align='center', echo=FALSE, include=identical(knitr:::pandoc_to(), 'html')}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/scriptingGifs/snapmatic6.gif', dpi = NA)
```

+ Your photos will be published on socialclub.rockstargames.com/member/USERNAME/photos, where USERNAME is replaced by your actual username.

```{r fig.align='center', echo=FALSE, include=identical(knitr:::pandoc_to(), 'html')}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/rockstarSocialClub.png', dpi = NA)
```
